name: النمط الأساسي الأولي
description: This is the first of many Islamic Art NFT OBJKT loops to spawn in my creations | This gif is a tribute to Mohamad Aljanabi and teachers at the مدرسة الزخرفة الهندسية Geometric Pattern Private School | Desenler Okulu [https://www.facebook.com/groups/zakhrafa.school] | This animation illustrates the first ever lesson I was taught at the beginning of my journey to learn to draw Islamic Geometry | 1080x1080 | 360 frames | 30fps |
